jd: From: Prashanth B, Tekgence prashanth.b@tekgence.com Reply to: prashanth.b@tekgence.com Title: Azure Data EngineerLocation: Chicago, IL (Need locals)Duration: Long term Required Skills• 10+ years of experience building data platforms & application architectures.• Proven experience building & deploying data warehouses with Azure platform is required with AL/ML capabilities.• Azure certification is desirable.Azure Data Engineer with Datastage Experience• Strong hands-on expertise in database & query performance tuning SQL queries and database best practices with PowerBI Dashboard Exp.• Full understanding of ETL IBM DataStage concepts and Data Warehousing concepts• Strong experience with modern data engineering technologies such as python, Spark, Airflow.• You have experience with Kafka and CDC tools for real-time data synchronization.• Proven experience in Data modeling using Dimension modelling & Data vault methodologies with Power BI reporting integration experience.• Strong Data Governance Tooling experience with Collibra.• Hands-on experience working with relational and NoSQL technologies (such as Oracle, Postgres, Mongo DB, etc.)• You have experience with continuous integration and collaboration tools like Azure ADO, GitHub and Confluence.• Experience in financial industry or banking is a plus --Regards,Prashanth B | Tekgence Inc.Talent Acquisition Specialist Email: prashanth.b@tekgence.com | Website: www.tekgence.com6655 Deseo Dr • Suite 104 • Irving, TX • 75039
